name: TodaysReligionNewsHeadlines
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what are today's religion news headlines
Developer Terms of Use
des: Religion News Headlines, presented by The Religion News Foundation, in collaboration with our subsidiary The Religion Service and ReligionNews.com, presents a daily run down of breaking news and commentary on events from around the globe that shape and define the impact and messaging of the world's faith traditions. The Religion News Headlines will be presented in a short format of 8 to 10 minutes. Each broadcast will consist of 2 short headlines followed by one headline that will be examined in-depth. The broadcast will conclude with another short headline and a Religion News Insight of the Day. The Insight is a dive into the cultures and practices of different faith traditions with an examination of the history and background of specific holidays, events and practices. For more information and deeper dive into the stories that define our faith, visit religionnews.com or subscribe to the Religion News Podcast, and, as always, thank you for joining in on the conversation.
